hibernate-mapping.query: select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Amount, tlf.AcctNo, tlf.ADate, tlf.IDate, tlf.Status, tlf.ToAcctNo, tlf.ACode, tlf.ACNoName, tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Cur, tlf.SettlementDate, tlf.RefundsDate ) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='PO' and tlf.ACNoName = 'PO' and CONVERT(char(10),tlf.ADate, 111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate, 111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate, 111) and tlf.AcctNo is null and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode and tlf.Active=true order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo

select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Amount, tlf.AcctNo, tlf.ADate, tlf.IDate, tlf.Status, tlf.ToAcctNo, tlf.ACode, tlf.ACNoName, tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Cur, tlf.SettlementDate, tlf.RefundsDate ) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='PO' and tlf.ACNoName = 'PO' and CONVERT(char(10),tlf.SettlementDate, 111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate, 111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate, 111) and tlf.AcctNo is null and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode and tlf.Active=true order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo

select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Amount, tlf.AcctNo, tlf.ADate, tlf.IDate, tlf.Status, tlf.ToAcctNo, tlf.ACode, tlf.ACNoName, tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Cur, tlf.SettlementDate, tlf.RefundsDate ) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='PO' and tlf.ACNoName = 'PO' and CONVERT(char(10),tlf.ADate, 111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate, 111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate, 111) and tlf.AcctNo is not null and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode and tlf.Active=true order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo

select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Amount, tlf.AcctNo, tlf.ADate, tlf.IDate, tlf.Status, tlf.ToAcctNo, tlf.ACode, tlf.ACNoName, tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Cur, tlf.SettlementDate, tlf.RefundsDate ) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='PO' and tlf.ACNoName = 'PO' and CONVERT(char(10),tlf.SettlementDate, 111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate, 111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate, 111) and tlf.AcctNo is not null and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode and tlf.Active=true order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo

select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Amount, tlf.AcctNo, tlf.ADate, tlf.IDate, tlf.Status, tlf.ToAcctNo, tlf.ACode, tlf.ACNoName, tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Cur, tlf.SettlementDate, tlf.RefundsDate ) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='PO' and tlf.ACNoName = 'PO' and CONVERT(char(10),tlf.SettlementDate,111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate,111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate,111) and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode and tlf.Active=true order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo

select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Amount, tlf.AcctNo, tlf.ADate, tlf.IDate, tlf.Status, tlf.ToAcctNo, tlf.ACode, tlf.ACNoName, tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Cur, tlf.SettlementDate, tlf.RefundsDate ) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='PO' and tlf.ACNoName = 'PO' and CONVERT(char(10),tlf.IDate,111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate,111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate,111) and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode and tlf.Active=true order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo

select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Amount, tlf.AcctNo, tlf.ADate, tlf.IDate, tlf.Status, tlf.ToAcctNo, tlf.ACode, tlf.ACNoName, tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Cur, tlf.SettlementDate, tlf.RefundsDate ) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='IR' and CONVERT(char(10),tlf.ADate,111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate,111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate,111) and tlf.AcctNo is not null and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode and tlf.Active=true order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo

select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Amount, tlf.AcctNo, tlf.ADate, tlf.IDate, tlf.Status, tlf.ToAcctNo, tlf.ACode, tlf.ACNoName, tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Cur, tlf.SettlementDate, tlf.RefundsDate ) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='IR' and CONVERT(char(10),tlf.SettlementDate,111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate,111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate,111) and tlf.AcctNo is not null and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode and tlf.Active=true order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo

select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Amount, tlf.AcctNo, tlf.ADate, tlf.IDate, tlf.Status, tlf.ToAcctNo, tlf.ACode, tlf.ACNoName, tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Cur, tlf.SettlementDate, tlf.RefundsDate ) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='IR' and CONVERT(char(10),tlf.IDate,111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate,111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate,111) and tlf.ToAcctNo is null and tlf.IDate is not null and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode and tlf.Active=true order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo

select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Amount, tlf.AcctNo, tlf.ADate, tlf.IDate, tlf.Status, tlf.ToAcctNo, tlf.ACode, tlf.ACNoName, tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Cur, tlf.SettlementDate, tlf.RefundsDate ) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='IR' and CONVERT(char(10),tlf.RefundsDate,111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate,111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate,111) and tlf.ToAcctNo is null and tlf.RefundsDate is not null and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode and tlf.Active=true order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo

select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Amount, tlf.AcctNo, tlf.ADate, tlf.IDate, tlf.Status, tlf.ToAcctNo, tlf.ACode, tlf.ACNoName, tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Cur, tlf.SettlementDate, tlf.RefundsDate ) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='IR' and CONVERT(char(10),tlf.IDate,111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate,111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate,111) and tlf.ToAcctNo is not null and tlf.IDate is not null and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode and tlf.Active=true order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo

select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Amount, tlf.AcctNo, tlf.ADate, tlf.IDate, tlf.Status, tlf.ToAcctNo, tlf.ACode, tlf.ACNoName, tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Cur, tlf.SettlementDate, tlf.RefundsDate ) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='IR' and CONVERT(char(10),tlf.RefundsDate,111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate,111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate,111) and tlf.ToAcctNo is not null and tlf.IDate is not null and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode and tlf.Active=true order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo

select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Amount, tlf.AcctNo, tlf.ADate, tlf.IDate, tlf.Status, tlf.ToAcctNo, tlf.ACode, tlf.ACNoName, tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Cur, tlf.SettlementDate, tlf.RefundsDate ) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='IR' and CONVERT(char(10),tlf.IDate,111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate,111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate,111) and tlf.AcctNo is not null and tlf.IDate is not null and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode and tlf.Active=true order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo

select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Amount, tlf.AcctNo, tlf.ADate, tlf.IDate, tlf.Status, tlf.ToAcctNo, tlf.ACode, tlf.ACNoName, tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Cur, tlf.SettlementDate, tlf.RefundsDate ) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='IR' and CONVERT(char(10),tlf.RefundsDate,111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate,111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate,111) and tlf.AcctNo is not null and tlf.RefundsDate is not null and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode and tlf.Active=true order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo

select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Amount, tlf.AcctNo, tlf.ADate, tlf.IDate, tlf.Status, tlf.ToAcctNo, tlf.ACode, tlf.ACNoName, tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Cur, tlf.SettlementDate, tlf.RefundsDate ) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='IR' and tlf.IDate is null and tlf.Active=true and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo

select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Cur, tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Amount, tlf.ADate, tlf.IDate
) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='IR' and CONVERT(char(10),tlf.ADate, 111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate, 111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate, 111) and tlf.Active=true and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo

select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Cur, tlf.AcctNo , tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Amount, tlf.ADate, tlf.ACode, tlf.IDate, tlf.ToAcctNo, tlf.Status, tlf.ACNoName ) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='IR' and tlf.ACNoName = 'POR' and CONVERT(char(10),tlf.IDate, 111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate, 111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate, 111) and tlf.ToAcctNo is null and tlf.Active=true and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo

select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Cur, tlf.AcctNo , tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Amount, tlf.ADate, tlf.ACode, tlf.IDate, tlf.ToAcctNo, tlf.Status, tlf.ACNoName ) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='IR' and tlf.ACNoName = 'POR' and CONVERT(char(10),tlf.IDate, 111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate, 111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate, 111) and tlf.ToAcctNo is not NULL and len(TOAcctno) > 5 and tlf.Active=true and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo

select new report_tlfDto ( tlf.PONo, tlf.Cur, tlf.AcctNo , tlf.RegisterNo, tlf.Amount, tlf.ADate, tlf.ACode, tlf.IDate, tlf.ToAcctNo, tlf.Status, tlf.ACNoName ) from MNMVIW00033 as tlf where substring(tlf.PONo,1,2)='IR' and tlf.ACNoName = 'POR' and CONVERT(char(10),tlf.IDate, 111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate, 111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate, 111) and tlf.Active=true and tlf.SourceBr =:sourceBranchCode order by tlf.Cur, tlf.PONo
